titleInfo.title: Governmental response to the COVID-19 pandemic in Long-Term Care residences for older people: preparedness, responses and challenges for the future: Germany

mods.abstract: This series of reports is one of the research results of the Mc-COVID-19 project, “MC-COVID19: Coordination mechanisms in Coronavirus management between different levels of government and public policy sectors in 15 European countries”, funded by the Spanish National Research Council (CSIC) within the CSIC-COVID-19 programme, as well as of the GoWPER project, “Restructuring the Governance of the Welfare State: Political Determinants and Implications for the (De)Commodification of Risks”, CSO2017-85598-R Plan Estatal de Investigación Científica y Técnica y de Innovación.
